content: row d14 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row d15 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower d chain ◦ 2 turn row d16 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ 8 row d17 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower d ◦ chain 2 turn until now this has been the usual way of adding a new flower at this point flower d should have one petal with no slip stitches one petal with precisely one slip_stitch and four petals with two slip stitches each row d18 bring the first part of your lace around so the lace sits in a loop work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets ◦ of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the middle turning chain from the second row row a2 ◦ where the optional marker was to be placed chain 2 turn remove marker row d19 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower d chain ◦ 2 turn at this point flower d has 4 petals with two slip stitches each and two petals with one slip stitch each 6 6 add the last flower photos in figures 15 and 16 now we ll join the last flower which we ll call flower e we ll also do one more vine-to-vine join between the two edges of the lace row e1 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the top of a petal of flower e ◦ chain 2 turn row e2 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower d chain ◦ 2 turn row e3 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e4 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower d chain ◦ 2 turn you re now done with flower d row e5 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e6 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch in middle chain of closest turning ◦ chain on vine chain 2 turn row e7 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e8 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row e9 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets
